extendedInfo.description: Shake! Broken Screen Prank provides you with the simulated effect of cracking your phone screen (The safest way to crack your screen!)Trick your friends and entertain yourself by making it look like your screen is cracked! It is a simple app that provides users with the simulated effect of cracking your screen, just as its title implies. The application includes unique crack illustrations complete with different corresponding sound effects. App Features:â¢ Crack action via single touch or shake the phone!!â¢ Crack effect initiation time delay optionsâ¢ Original âcracking glassâ sound effects includedâ¢ Save the crack of the screen you make to your SD card.â¢ Choose from a gallery of 5 cracks.â¢ Send the cracks to your friend's face to friends via facebook, twitter and others.â¢ Change background from home screen to an image from photo gallery or camera.Permissions used explained: â Camera - used to take photo to set as background â Write to SD card - Allows to save your artwork to your phoneâ Internet to show ads. Important We want to keep our apps completely free as well as clean of intrusive and push ads which users don't like while we keep it updated with more and more features. In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following â Search shortcut icon on your home screen (see image below). Search shortcut on your bookmarks. This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future. You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in anyway.Keywords: Crack Screen, Broken Sreen

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: I like the thought they put into this app. Just it dosen\'t look realistic enough to fool someone. I\'m not saying that it needs to look perfect I\'m just trying to say it needs to look more real. Other than that great app. (Even though I just pretty much it was a unrealistic app.)
reviews.author: Frank Brown

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s
reviews.comment: Good app, nice breaking sound and effects, however must have addional feature as that of scratching the screen, so would look bit more realistic
